name: Project D.I.N.O.
description:
Hey! Our company called Eudokia Games and this is our game! Our team is hard at work on it right now. The game is at an early stage of development. You can check our website

Totem - company that helps us in development. Their friendly and constructive community helped us get started on the game! 

Totem is an indie game development collective that unites creators and players around a universe of interconnected game experiences. In Project D.I.N.O you can log in to your Totem account to view your owned Avatars and Tools. Those assets can be used in other games in the Totem ecosystem - Try them out! 

Some unique interactions we have: 

- Beat Island Ambush to get a special Ambush dinosaur! 

- Hatch a dinosaur in Project D.I.N.O to get a special companion in Dreadstone Keep!

In our game you play as a young archaeologist in the first person. You have a Base where you can build aviaries for dinosaurs and various infrastructure. At the base, you can conduct research and revive dinosaurs from their bones. In order to find the bones, you must travel to different areas and dig there.
